body.description: Mirrotek has created a unique and elegant series of full length shatterproof mirrors. Designed with simplicity and precision, each mirror is designed to provide you with a full length body view. The Over the Door Mirror has been designed with dimensions of 48” x 14” x 1.5” and a total weight of 7.5 lbs., making it lightweight and easy to hang. With no assembly required upon delivery, you can instantly hang this mirror on your bedroom door and enjoy the view. Crafted from shatterproof mirror materials, this over the door mirror is an optical quality full length body mirror. Mirrotek has been created quality dressing mirrors, accessories, clocks, gifts and more since 1942. With a passion for innovation and creativity, Mirrotek creates practical and quality home additions. Dedicated to customer satisfaction, Mirrotek strives for customer satisfaction. Enjoy the quality and practical home solutions created by Mirrotek and make a lasting impression in your home for years to come. Made in the USA

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Mirrotek Over the Door Full Length Dressing Mirror Product Details Color: White 14 x 1.5 x 48 inches No Assembly Required Easily Hang on Any Door Or Closet Weight: 7.5 LBS Full Length Optical Mirror Designed in The USA Product Uses Configure and customize your Full length mirror without any tools. Just remove from the box and hang on any closet or door. Relieve yourself of the common frustrations of getting ready to go out. Easy to install right out of the box and available in many colors and finishes to fit your style. A Stunning Focal Point for Any Decor The Mirrotek Hanging Full Length Dressing Mirror Wouldn't it be convenient to have a full length mirror in any closet or door needed. Well with the Mirrotek full length mirror you can. Available in many different colors and finishes to customize to your own sense of style and decor. This easy to install mirror features a slim profile and comes in Eight beautiful wood finishes. It hooks right over the door, so space is no issue. Frustration Free Assembly Installation is extremely easy. It will arrive to your home Fully assembled. All you need to do is customize and configure it for your own routine and demands. With a super slim and functional profile your door can still be opened or closed with ease.

A High Quality Dressing Mirror for Any Style Full Length Dressing Mirror Your mirror comes complete with a full length dressing mirror. No need to run to the nearest mirror to see if everything matches. The full dressing mirror measures a full 48 inch long. The attached hooks offer a comfortable length to match your height during installation. Slim Profile and Endless Design Options Easily attach and detach from closet or door without the use of any tools or leave it on the Super Slim Profile allows you to close the door even with mirror attached and let it become a stunning focal point in your décor. Add a Touch of Style to Any Space Not only is this a great space saver but with no holes needed to drill it is safe for people who rent apartments. All of our mirrors and frames are designed in the USA. Always look your best with our quality Mirrotek full length dressing mirror.

About Mirrotek We offer a vast selection of dressing mirrors, accessories, clocks, gifts and more. A Beauty Mirror For Everything Framed Wall or Door Full Length Mirror This framed wall or door mirror subtly enhances a bedroom or dressing room without taking up a great deal of space. Easily attaches to Standard Doors or Walls with Quality Brackets Mirror Measures 48 inch Slim Profile to fit any closet or door Available in many finishes and styles No tools needed

reviews.reviewerName: Wendy from The WoodlandsWendy from The Woodlands
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for narrow closet doors
reviews.reviewText: It took forever to find a door mirror that was narrow enough to fit between the square faceplate and the door hinge of my daughter's closet door, but now that I have, it couldn't be more perfect. It was packaged extremely well with no damage upon arrival. There are no tools needed...just unfold the hanger and go. There are three different levels in which to find your best option. I can't say enough about this. If you have narrow closet doors, this is the mirror for you. I ended up using a 3M command strip on the bottom to keep it from bouncing/banging each time the door is opened and closed. It works perfect and won't ruin the door finish. Great find...thanks again, Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, clean look
reviews.reviewText: Mirrotek - Full Length Adjustable Over The Door Mirror is great. Packaged well, delivered safe and sound. I love the method used to hang it over the door and the height levels to choose from. It is very sturdy and well made. I purchased the white to blend in with the door and very pleased with the look. The reflection is sharp and undistorted. The mirror was on sale, in incredible price for the value. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice mirror for the price. I got it on sale. Heavyweight and hangs nicely on door. Easy to hang with hooks enclosed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble (barely any assembly), over door hanger is thin yet very sturdy. The three choices of hanging heights are good, and overall I'm very happy. The over door hanger was a little scratched, I will touch up with some white paint. Otherwise very nice, esp for one of the lower price pointed units.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it for price.
reviews.reviewText: Have had major interior renovations done inside my home which has included new doors. Didn’t want a mirror drilled into a new door. So, I found this hanging one. Honestly, it does what it’s supposed to do, but I still can’t help feeling disappointed. It’s not super well made... not for the $45+ price tag. Box came in partially open and damaged. Thank god the mirror wasn’t. Still seems like I may need to reinforce it with some glue around the wooden frame to make sure it holds together. The mirror itself was packaged well but all the other parts and pieces (over the door hanger metal pieces and screws) were all randomly loose in the box. It seemed like something someone bought and returned. I’m currently in a quarantine area and I live with and take care of a parent with a debilitating disease and with an autoimmune issue. So going to Walmart wasn’t an option. I’m going to go ahead and keep the mirror as returning would be more of a pain at the moment with what all is going on. My advice is if you can buy a cheap $10-$20 long mirror that they sell from Walmart- then get one of those and either attach to the back of your door or super/hot glue some hinges to the back if you want an over-the-door hanging mirror.This wasn’t worth the money overall and you can get/make something nicer that’s sturdier for less $$. Save yourself $30. Order or get a mirror from Walmart or from somewhere else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is well made and light in weight. It has a nice thick white frame with strong clips. It also has the brackets already attached on the back so it is very easy to connect the two over the door hangers. This mirror looks classy and serves us well. We did put some Removable Mounting Putty behind the frame at the bottom so it would not move when opening and closing the door. We are very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a full length mirror in my bedroom but didn’t want to spend too much money. It hangs nicely over the door! Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Proudly Made in the USA (Unless we’ve annexed Columbia)
reviews.reviewText: I don’t appreciate the false advertising. The box this item came in (which was a brown shipping box, looks nothing like the box pictured) says in rather large letters: Made in Colombia. I purchased this mirror over other options because I thought I was supporting an American made product. I didn’t intend to support Columbia! The mirror itself is OK. It was difficult to get it to sit level over the door. I paid about $45.00 for this item. It is now selling for $70.00. Worth it at $45.00…not worth it at $70.00.
Sencillo, llego en buen estado y fue fácil de colocar.
Excellent quality and very well packaged . Looks great on my closet door
Es demasiado caro para la calidad del producto. Creo que no debería costar más de 500 mxn.
Came very fast and very easy to install. A bit pricey after I compare it with other stores. Overall pleased.
